description.value:
Gain +10 to Dodge Tests to avoid attacks from weapons with the Blast Quality. Medals can't be acquired, only earned. Looks like a Silver Medallion with a Bronze Circle stamped in the centre.

Requirements

Distinguished Service Medal: Infiltrate behind Enemy Lines to destroy an active Rebel Artillery Battery.

Effect: Special

Notes: -
